text.autoconfig.mutuality.option.crossbo: Allows combining the Piercing and Multishot enchantments.
text.autoconfig.mutuality.option.infinit: Allows combining the Infinity and Mending enchantments.
text.autoconfig.mutuality.option.trident: Allows combining the Riptide enchantment with other trident enchantments.
text.autoconfig.mutuality.option.waterBo: Allows combining the Depth Strider and Frost Walker enchantments.
text.autoconfig.mutuality.title: Mutuality Configuration
